name: Savage Men
short_description: A high energy whirlwind of gorgeous hard bodies and seductive sensations await you as you make your way into New York's award winning male revues. You will be greeted by an entourage of finely sculpted Magic Mike themed greeters, waiters and hosts, whom will anxiously cater to your every whim. After you make your way to the main room, you and your guests will have a chance to participate in a few pre-show activities, or if you prefer, sit back, enjoy a cocktail, the environment, and perhaps chat it up with some of our sexy staff. Your fantasies come true as our Internationally acclaimed models leap from the covers of your favorite publications and onto the stage, delivering an awesome array of breath catching moves while peeling off their Savagely Seductive costumes. Each male dancers act is carefully choreographed to fit seamlessly into this high end but Savagely Seductive show.
